HomePage.text2: We Complete The Sweetness Of Life!
HomePage.text6: Traditional, dense, and fragrant Gowla Java Cetak is coconut sugar molded into rustic blocks with deep sweetness and a naturally smoky note. Ideal for melting, grating, or mixing into both sweet and savory recipes.
HomePage.text9: Golden, fragrant, and irresistibly rich Gowla Hanau Semut is not just a sweetener, it’s a story of nature’s perfection. Made from 100% pure arenga nectar, our granulated palm sugar adds deep caramel tones to your coffee, desserts, and sauces. No additives, no compromise just authentic indulgence in every grain.
HomePage.text11: Smooth and richly sweet, Gowla Java Sirup is made from slow cooked coconut flower sap forming a thick, golden syrup with mellow notes and natural minerals. Perfect for pancakes, drinks, yogurt, or even salad dressings.
HomePage.text13: Looking for natural sweetener alternatives in baked goods, packaged foods, and drinks like coffee and tea.
HomePage.text15: That prioritize natural flavors and premium quality.
HomePage.text17: Including organic, vegan, or low-GI product lines
HomePage.text19: Who are switching to healthier, more natural sweeteners as part of their daily lifestyle.

Footer.text1: PT Indosweet Jaya Nusantara is a proudly Indonesian company focused on producing premium palm sugar and coconut sugar. Through our fully in-house production system, we ensure every batch meets consistent quality, safety, and flavor crafted with care and backed by strict standards by using 100% pure palm nectar.
